text_block_list.text:
Fuji Kiseki encounters a younger student<n>who is
upset about her own distance<n>aptitude. Fuji
Kiseki decides to<n>encourage her with a miracle.

I understand how she feels and can now<n>decide
between continuing the Classic<n>Triple Crown tour
or starting the mile<n>tour. The best path for her is...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: This makes our next race the Japanese<n>Derby.

Fuji Kiseki decides to tackle her<n>inaptitude for
longer races head-on and<n>forges ahead with the
Classic Triple<n>Crown tour.

When she announces her lack of affinity<n>for long
races, the public is shocked, but<n>her fans'
expectations don't wane in the<n>slightest.

In order to show her younger schoolmate<n>a
miracle, Fuji Kiseki aims for the<n>Japanese Derby.
This is the beginning of<n>a very difficult challenge!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: This makes our next race the NHK Mile<n>Cup.

Fuji Kiseki sets her sights for the top and<n>forges
ahead with the mile tour.

The public is shocked when she<n>announces her
sudden agenda change,<n>but her fans'
expectations don't wane in<n>the slightest.

In order to show her younger schoolmate<n>a
miracle, Fuji Kiseki aims for the NHK<n>Mile Cup.
This is the beginning of a new<n>challenge!
